overview: Brigitta Bulgari, with her lustful power and limitless sexuality, plays the role of the horny wife. Her behavior upsets her husband to no end and leaves him with no choice but to call in his doctor friend to help him. The therapy prescribed has an immediate effect and soon has her back living a "normal" life... The cast pulls out all the stops, delivers non-stop sex action that will captivate the audience until the final climax!
title: Solution
